category.oldswing.name: Old Swing
gui.oldswing.settings.title: Old Swing Settings
gui.oldswing.customize.reset.@Tooltip[0]: This will delete all items within the list.
gui.oldswing.customize.reset.@Tooltip[1]: Click the reset checkmark to enable this button.
gui.oldswing.customize.add.@Tooltip: Add the item typed in the input box.
gui.oldswing.customize.autofill.@Tooltip: Add the item in your character's hand.
gui.oldswing.customize.remove.@Tooltip: Delete %s from the customized speed list.
text.autoconfig.oldswing.title: General Settings
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.eyeCandy: §bBring back the old durability bar colors that haven't been seen since Minecraft 1.8.
§bBring back the old item holding and swinging position.
§bBring back the old 2D floating items. This will "simulate" items being in 2D to maintain mod compatibility. §f(§cWIP§f)
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.animatio: §bAn animation that plays after a swing or change in slot.
§bAn animation that plays when an item's durability changes.
§bA particle animation that appears after attacking an entity with a sword.
§bA subtle animation that is applied to the arm when you look around.
§bA smooth animation that is applied when sneaking.
§bA subtle animation that is applied to the arm and viewing distance when jumping or falling.
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.swings.t:
The higher the swing number is the slower the swinging animation will be.§r
§aAlpha/Beta Minecraft§f: §b8
§6Modern Minecraft§f: §b6

§eIf you are photosensitive, it is recommended to set speeds to 0.
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.swings.i: The swing speed of items that are not blocks, swords, or tools.
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.swings.h:
Override swing speed when haste is applied.
§eSet this to §c-1 §eto §cdisable§e.
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.swings.m:
Override swing speed when mining fatigue is applied.
§eSet this to §c-1 §eto §cdisable§e.
text.autoconfig.oldswing.option.swings.g:
§bThis value will override §nany§r §bswing speed that does not match the given number.
§eSet this to §c-1 §eto §cdisable§e.
